name: telanix-backend
description: Backend API para TelaNix - Sistema de avaliação de filmes

scripts.db:init: node -e "import('pg').then(async ({default: pg}) => { const client = new pg.Client({ connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL }); await client.connect(); const sql = require('fs').readFileSync('../db/init.sql', 'utf8'); await client.query(sql); await client.end(); console.log('Database initialized!'); })"
